Race.SpecificTitle: Parishwide School District -- 1.57 Mills - SB - 10 Yrs
Race.FullText: Shall the Catahoula Parish School District of the Parish of Catahoula, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a one and fifty-seven hundredths (1.57) mills tax on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $59,600 expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2017 and ending with the year 2026 for the purpose of providing additional funds to be used for the purpose of constructing, repairing, maintaining, improving and supporting public school buildings and facilities within the District, equipping said buildings and facilities and the repairing and replacement of equipment therefor, said millage to represent a two hundredths of a mill (.02) increase over the 1.55 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2016 pursuant to an election held on January 21, 2006?

Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Prot. Dist. No. 2 -- 3 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Fire Protection District No. 2 Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Fire Protection District No. 2 of the Parish of Catahoula, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of three (3) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $26,700 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2017 and ending with the year 2026, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and operating fire protection facilities and equipment in and for the District, including the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes and paying charges for fire hydrant rentals?
